data.description: interface to Dream Cheeky missile launchers
data.PS: The following links are only valid for module list maintainers:
data.rationale:
The current issue of USB toy missile launchers from Dream Cheeky
    have new protocol to control. The protocol is very differ to old
    ones. Device::USB::MissileLauncher was written for old ones and can
    not control currnet ones. This module can, and has semi-comaptible
    methods of Device::USB::MissileLauncher .

    You can check the toy at there:
    http://www.dreamcheeky.com/product/missile-launcher.php
